message.name: ERR_FV_CAMPAIGN_NAME_HAS_SPACES
message.locale: Name must not contain any spaces.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CAMPAIGN_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The name '%1s' entered by you already exists. Please enter a different name.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RULSET_ALREADY_SELECTED
message.locale: This rule set has already been assigned to an other campaign. Please select a different rule set.

message.name: ERR_FV_EXPIRY_DATETIME_CANNOT_BE_A_PAST_DATE
message.locale: The Expiry Date/Time cannot be in the past.

message.name: ERR_NO_RULES_LINK
message.locale: This citizen campaign does not have an associated AdviceRulesLink record.

message.name: ERR_RULE_SET_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: A rule set must be specified for this campaign.

message.name: ERR_NAME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: A name must be specified for this campaign.

message.name: ERR_NO_RULE_SET
message.locale: The rule set %1s does not exist in the system.

message.name: ERR_NO_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: The rule class %1s does not exist in the system.

message.name: ERR_IF_IMAGE_IMAGE_NAME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: An image name must be specified if an image is specified.

message.name: ERR_IF_IMAGE_NAME_IMAGE_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: An image must be specified if an image name is specified.

message.name: ERR_IF_ALT_TEXT_IMAGE_NAME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: An image must be specified if alt text is specified.

message.name: ERR_IMAGE_NAME_MUST_HAVE_EXTENSION
message.locale: The image name must end in .png or .gif

message.name: ERR_RULESET_DOES_NOT_INHERIT_FROM_CORE_CAMPAIGN_RULESET
message.locale: The campaign rule set must include a rule class that inherits from the rule set CoreCampaignRuleset.AbstractCampaignAdviceItem.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_ADD_AN_IMAGE_ON_MODIFY
message.locale: A campaign must have an image specified on insert if it is to have its image modified.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_CANCELLED_CAMPAIGN
message.locale: A cancelled campaign cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_ACTIVATE_ACTIVE_CAMPAIGN
message.locale: An already active campaign cannot be activated.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_EXPIRED_CAMPAIGN
message.locale: An expired campaign cannot be modified.
